component.name: EarX
component.summary: A simple application to control your Nothing earbuds ANC (Active Noise Cancellation) modes.

description.p: A simple Rust application using gtk-rs and Adw (Libadwaita) to control your Nothing earbuds ANC (Active Noise Cancellation) modes. This application demonstrates how to build a native desktop interface with Rust, async/await (via Tokio), and Bluetooth functionalities (via bluer).
